localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
*Ring ring*

"Hello GameStop how can I help you?"

"Yea hi I'm calling to buy 500 shares."
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
*戒指

"你好，游戏机公司，请问有什么可以帮你？"

"是的，你好，我打电话买500股。"

*戒指

"你好，遊戲機公司，請問有什麼可以幫你？"

"是的，你好，我打電話買500股。"
